data.eml:eml: Description of Medwayella independencia (Siphonaptera, Stivaliidae), a new species of flea from Mindanao Island, the Philippines and their phoretic mites, and miscellaneous flea records from the Malay Archipelago

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Hastriter, Michael W., Bush, Sarah E. (2014): Description of Medwayella independencia (Siphonaptera, Stivaliidae), a new species of flea from Mindanao Island, the Philippines and their phoretic mites, and miscellaneous flea records from the Malay Archipelago. ZooKeys 408: 107-123, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.408.7479, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.408.7479
